\documentclass[tikz,convert={outfile=\jobname.svg}]{standalone}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.5, line width=3mm]
	\draw [red] (-3, 0) -- (3, 0);
	\draw [blue] (0, -3) -- (0, 3);
	\foreach \i in {0, 90, 180, 270}
	{
	\begin{scope}[rotate=\i]
		\draw (-3, 1) to (-2, 1) to[out=0,in=270] (-1, 2) -- (-1, 3);
	\end{scope}
	}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
